column5: The shared room is located within a yoga temple, close to downtown Denton. Price includes Yoga classes, spiritual discussions, sacred ceremony and Vegan, Organic meals (currently 3 lunches per week). Shared large furnished bedroom, newly remodeled bathroom, hardwood floors.  Access to full kitchen, washer/dryer, bike and backyard. Must be community minded, quiet (especially during temple programs and healing sessions) respectful and tidy.  No drugs/alcohol/tobacco on sacred premises.
